CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 2, 1957, pg. A9, reads: "Harlequins back NAACP - At the regular business meeting of the Harlequin Club, on Feb. 23, Charles Shelton, president, presented a check to Louis Mason, 1956 campaign membership chairman of the NAACP, representing individual memberships for the entire club to the NAACP. The Harlequins also announced plans for a spring benefit formal on May 31 at Gateway Plaza, from which NAACP will receive all proceeds.  Shown at the business meeting are, standing: Robert Watson, Loretta Kendrick, Sumner Carter, Robert Dillard, Sally Fenn, Doris High, David Goggins, Clarence Blakey Jr., Charles Shelton Jr., Louis Mason.  Sitting: Vivian Verse, Myrna Davis, Connie Prather, Gladys Goggins, Dolores Whitely.  Club members not shown in picture are Eugene Connors, Ethel Robinson, John Watkins, Louis Parron and Carl Robinson. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Harlequin Club members, possibly including seated from left: Connie Prather and Gladys Goggins; standing: Robert Dillard, Doris High, Charles Shelton Jr., and Louis Mason accepting check for NAACP, in YMCA
